meaningMnemonic: This <radical>gate</radical> of <radical>horns</radical> will take you to <radical>heaven</radical>. These horns are <kanji>related</kanji> and <kanji>connected</kanji> to heaven in some way.
readingMnemonic: They are <kanji>related</kanji> and <kanji>connected</kanji> to heaven because these are the horns that Genghis <reading>Khan</reading> (かん) made from his enemies. God said he could come into heaven if he made a gate of horns, so that's what he did.
